Testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
Testimonials.description: See how ImgEnhancer transforms creative workflows

items.content: ImgEnhancer completely transformed my photography workflow! I can now upscale my portraits to incredible detail levels. The AI enhancement adds depth and clarity that was impossible before. This tool is pure magic for professional photographers.

As a digital artist, ImgEnhancer has revolutionized how I work with AI-generated images. I can create at lower resolutions and then upscale with stunning detail. The creativity controls let me add exactly the right amount of enhancement.

Our design studio has been using ImgEnhancer for client projects, and the results are phenomenal. We can deliver ultra-high-resolution artwork that our clients absolutely love. It's become an essential tool in our creative process.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Common questions about our AI image enhancement technology and how it can transform your images

items.question: How does ImgEnhancer's AI upscaler & enhancer work?
items.answer: The feeling you will have is like having a magic wand! ImgEnhancer will transform any image of your choice into a higher-resolution version, adding as much detail as you wish. You will be able to direct the upscaling process with a description and various controls such as 'Creativity', which will allow you to control the level of hallucinations (and therefore the new details) that you want the AI to generate.

items.question: Is ImgEnhancer suitable for beginners?
items.answer: ImgEnhancer is designed to be accessible and user-friendly for creators of all backgrounds and skill levels. It's intuitive interface, in-depth tutorials, and community are all available to support you through your creative journey.

items.question: Who can enhance their workflow and creative process with ImgEnhancer upscaler?
items.answer: ImgEnhancer is designed for a broad spectrum of users including professionals and enthusiasts in photography, graphic design, digital art, and illustration, who require high-resolution images and meticulous detail enhancements. It also serves AI artists and creators who generate images with AI and are looking to upscale them for more resolution and depth.

items.question: How much does ImgEnhancer AI cost?
items.answer: The applicable prices for ImgEnhancer AI are those displayed on our pricing page at the time of the purchase. Where possible, prices are shown in your local currency. Please note that VAT and/or local taxes may be added to the final price, depending on your region. When you opt for an annual subscription, you get two months free.

items.question: Will the upscaled images have artefacts?
items.answer: Sometimes, yes. But in most cases, they can be controlled using the Creativity, HDR, and Resemblance sliders, as well as through natural language with your text prompt. Most artifacts occur only when the Creativity or HDR values are set too high, or the Resemblance is not properly configured.

items.question: Is the payment service secure?
items.answer: Yes, our payment service is 100% secure. Financial processing is handled by Stripe, and we retain no card details on our end. Stripe upholds security standards comparable to those of banks.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept payments via credit or debit cards, including VISA, MasterCard, American Express, iDeal, SOFORT, Bancontact, Przelewy24, Giropay, EPS, GrabPay, AliPay, and many more. Currently, we do not accept PayPal or cryptocurrency.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot offer refunds due to the substantial expenses associated with the AI-driven upscaling process. Our costs are significant, particularly for the GPU processing time required to upscale your images. During sign up you agree to withhold your right to refund for this reason.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Log in, go to the top of ImgEnhancer AI and click Billing, you will be redirected to Stripe's billing portal where you can download invoices, switch plans and cancel your subscription.

Security.title: Security Verification
Security.verificationDescription: Please complete security verification to confirm you are a real user. This will only take a few seconds.
Security.defaultDescription: To ensure service quality, please complete security verification.
Security.privacyNotice: This verification is provided by Cloudflare to protect your privacy
Security.securityInfo: We use intelligent algorithms to identify malicious behavior, normal users can usually pass verification quickly

items.question: Do credits expire?
items.answer: One-time purchased credits never expire and can be used permanently. Subscription credits are valid during the subscription period. If you cancel your subscription, unused credits will expire at the end of the next billing cycle.

items.question: Can I request a refund?
items.answer: Due to the actual costs of our AI services, refunds are generally not supported. If you encounter technical issues or service quality problems, please contact customer service, and we will handle it based on specific circumstances.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time in your account settings. After cancellation, you can still use your remaining credits until the current billing cycle ends.

items.question: Do you support NSFW content?
items.answer: To comply with relevant laws and terms of service, we do not support processing NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content, including pornographic, violent, or other inappropriate content.

items.question: What payment methods are supported?
items.answer: We support major credit card payments, including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and others. Payments are securely processed by Stripe to ensure your payment information is safe.

items.question: Can processed images be used commercially?
items.answer: Yes, images processed through our service can be used for commercial purposes. However, please ensure that the original images have legal usage rights.

items.question: What happens if image processing fails?
items.answer: If image processing fails, credits will be automatically refunded to your account. You can try processing again or contact customer service for assistance.

items.question: Are there processing time limits?
items.answer: Most image processing completes within 1-3 minutes. If processing time exceeds 10 minutes, the system will automatically cancel the task and refund credits.
